title: Synchronous Online Mathematics Leadership Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and managerial leadership experience
context.additional_context: Blended education environment combining webinar-based synchronous learning and offline workshops

learning_goals: Analyze mathematical decision-making processes in synchronous online environments and propose workplace applications
Design real-time problem-solving strategies with team members using webinar-based collaboration tools
Achieve over 80% positive response rates on self-efficacy surveys at the end of training
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
